css: html, body { height: 100%; margin: 0; padding: 0; scroll-behavior: smooth; }

body { font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; background: radial-gradient(70% 70% at 18% 20%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.12), transparent), linear-gradient(135deg, #f8fafc 0%, #eef2ff 100%); color: #0f172a; margin: 0; min-height: 100%; overflow-x: hidden; scroll-snap-type: y mandatory; padding: 0 0 72px; }
body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; inset: 0; background: radial-gradient(55% 55% at 78% 12%, rgba(45, 212, 191, 0.12), transparent); pointer-events: none; }

.group { position: relative; width: min(1280px, calc(100% - 96px)); margin: 64px auto 0; padding: clamp(32px, 5vw, 56px); background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.82); border: 1px solid rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.22); border-radius: 28px; box-shadow: 0 32px 80px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.14); backdrop-filter: blur(14px); display: grid; row-gap: 28px; align-content: start; box-sizing: border-box; scroll-snap-align: start; }

.group > .element { background: rgba(248, 250, 252, 0.92); border-radius: 24px; padding: 24px 28px; border: 1px solid rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.25); box-shadow: 0 18px 40px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.12); transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease; }
#overviewSlide, #productSlide { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(12, minmax(0, 1fr)); gap: 24px; }
#overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(1), #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(2) { background: none; border: none; box-shadow: none; padding: 0; }
#productSlide > .element:nth-child(1), #productSlide > .element:nth-child(2) { background: none; border: none; box-shadow: none; padding: 0; }
.chartifact-dropdown label { font-size: 0.78rem; letter-spacing: 0.08em; text-transform: uppercase; color: #475569; font-weight: 600; }

.chartifact-dropdown select { border-radius: 16px; padding: 12px 16px; border: 1px solid rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3); background: rgba(248, 250, 252, 0.96); color: #0f172a; font-weight: 600; box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.12); transition: box-shadow 0.2s ease, border-color 0.2s ease; }
.chartifact-dropdown select:focus { outline: none; border-color: rgba(14, 165, 233, 0.7); box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(14, 165, 233, 0.25); }
.tabulator { background: transparent; border-radius: 22px; border: 1px solid rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.26); box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6), 0 18px 44px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.1); }

@media (max-width: 1280px) { .group { width: calc(100% - 64px); padding: 36px; } #overviewSlide, #productSlide { grid-template-columns: repeat(8, minmax(0, 1fr)); } #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(4) { grid-column: 1 / span 8; } #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(5) { grid-column: 1 / span 4; } #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(6) { grid-column: 5 / span 4; } #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(7) { grid-column: 1 / span 8; } #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(8) { grid-column: 1 / span 8; } #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(9) { grid-column: 1 / span 8; } #productSlide > .element:nth-child(1) { grid-column: 1 / span 8; } #productSlide > .element:nth-child(2) { grid-column: 1 / span 8; justify-self: start; } #productSlide > .element:nth-child(4) { grid-column: 1 / span 8; } #productSlide > .element:nth-child(5) { grid-column: 1 / span 4; } #productSlide > .element:nth-child(6) { grid-column: 5 / span 4; } #productSlide > .element:nth-child(7) { grid-column: 1 / span 8; } }

@media (max-width: 720px) { body { padding-bottom: 32px; } .group { width: calc(100% - 32px); margin: 32px auto 0; padding: 28px 22px; border-radius: 24px; row-gap: 20px; } #overviewSlide, #productSlide { grid-template-columns: repeat(1, minmax(0, 1fr)); gap: 18px; } .group > .element { grid-column: 1 / -1 !important; padding: 20px 22px; } #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(1), #overviewSlide > .element:nth-child(2), #productSlide > .element:nth-child(1), #productSlide > .element:nth-child(2) { padding: 0; } .chartifact-dropdown { width: 100%; } }

calculation.vegaExpression: var metrics = data('overallAggregates')[0] || { totalRevenue: 0, totalUnits: 0, avgOnTime: 0, avgLeadTime: 0 };var revenueLine = '\u2022 $' + format((metrics.totalRevenue || 0) / 1e6, '.1f') + 'M revenue across ' + format(metrics.totalUnits || 0, ',.0f') + ' shipments year-to-date.';var serviceLine = '\u2022 On-time promise of ' + format((metrics.avgOnTime || 0) * 100, '.1f') + '% with ' + format(metrics.avgLeadTime || 0, '.1f') + ' day average lead time across the network.';var exploreLine = '\u2022 Review momentum, channel mix, and the heat map to spot geographic surges.';var navLine = '\u2022 Scroll or press PgDn to move to the drilldown slide for product focus.';var interactionLine = '\u2022 Click any bar, arc, or state to spotlight the same slice everywhere.';return [{ order: 1, text: 'Slide 1 \u00b7 Command center overview', style: 'label', y: 16 }, { order: 2, text: revenueLine, style: 'body', y: 52 }, { order: 3, text: serviceLine, style: 'body', y: 80 }, { order: 4, text: exploreLine, style: 'body', y: 108 }, { order: 5, text: navLine, style: 'body', y: 136 }, { order: 6, text: interactionLine, style: 'body', y: 164 }];

var metrics = data('overallAggregates')[0] || { totalRevenue: 0, totalUnits: 0, avgOnTime: 0, avgLeadTime: 0 };return [{ metric: 'Portfolio revenue', value: '$' + format((metrics.totalRevenue || 0) / 1e6, '.1f') + 'M', detail: 'Five flagship products' }, { metric: 'Units delivered', value: format(metrics.totalUnits || 0, ',.0f'), detail: 'Shipments across top markets' }, { metric: 'On-time promise', value: format((metrics.avgOnTime || 0) * 100, '.1f') + '%', detail: 'Fulfillment punctuality' }, { metric: 'Avg lead time', value: format(metrics.avgLeadTime || 0, '.1f') + ' days', detail: 'Door-to-door velocity' }];

var focus = selectedProduct === 'All Products' ? 'All products aggregated' : selectedProduct + ' focus';var metrics = data('productAggregates')[0] || { totalRevenue: 0, totalUnits: 0, avgOnTime: 0, avgLeadTime: 0 };return [{ metric: 'Revenue', value: '$' + format((metrics.totalRevenue || 0) / 1e6, '.1f') + 'M', detail: focus }, { metric: 'Units shipped', value: format(metrics.totalUnits || 0, ',.0f'), detail: 'Delivered across regions' }, { metric: 'On-time', value: format((metrics.avgOnTime || 0) * 100, '.1f') + '%', detail: 'Service reliability' }, { metric: 'Lead time', value: format(metrics.avgLeadTime || 0, '.1f') + ' days', detail: 'Average transit' }];

var focusName = selectedProduct === 'All Products' ? 'all products' : selectedProduct;var metrics = data('productAggregates')[0] || { totalRevenue: 0, totalUnits: 0, avgOnTime: 0, avgLeadTime: 0 };var revenueLine = '\u2022 $' + format((metrics.totalRevenue || 0) / 1e6, '.1f') + 'M from ' + format((metrics.totalUnits || 0), ',.0f') + ' shipments for ' + focusName + '.';var serviceLine = '\u2022 On-time performance at ' + format((metrics.avgOnTime || 0) * 100, '.1f') + '% with ' + format(metrics.avgLeadTime || 0, '.1f') + ' day lead times.';var promptLine = '\u2022 Use the selector to pivot into a single product or zoom back out.';var interactionLine = '\u2022 Channel bars, ranked states, and the map filter the table together.';return [{ order: 1, text: 'Slide 2 \u00b7 Product drilldown', style: 'label', y: 16 }, { order: 2, text: revenueLine, style: 'body', y: 52 }, { order: 3, text: serviceLine, style: 'body', y: 80 }, { order: 4, text: promptLine, style: 'body', y: 108 }, { order: 5, text: interactionLine, style: 'body', y: 136 }];

text.value: Unified visibility into revenue velocity, service health, and coverage intensity.
Select any node in the table to inspect readiness for each focus product.
Sort by revenue, units, or service quality to rebalance focus.
States highlighted above mirror the top-five list for the chosen product.
